name: nesselrode
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cold or frozen sweet dish made with cream, candied fruit (= fruit preserved in sugar), and chestnuts, or a mixture of these fruits and nuts used in such a dish: Nesselrode is a very Christmassy creamy jelly with chestnuts, brandy, and lots of dried fruit. a Nesselrode pudding with chestnuts
More examplesFewer examplesNesselrode pie is a chilled, creamy pie traditionally made with roasted chestnuts, candied fruit, and rum or brandy.Nesselrode pie is a custard cream pie, popular in Europe during the nineteenth century.
